entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
